items.title: Hamas fires rockets at Tel Aviv as Israel renews Gaza ground campaign
items.description: It comes after Israel resumes its bombing campaign and ground operations in Gaza.

items.title: Fingerprints identify Paraguayan woman seven years after death
items.description: Ainoha Izaga Ibieta Lima, 33, was found dead in a poultry shed attached to a farmhouse in Spain's Girona province in 2018.

items.title: Zelensky tells Russia to drop 'unnecessary' demands ahead of peace talks
items.description: Ukraine's leader also says taking Nato membership off the table would be a "big gift to Russia".

items.title: Turkey arrests dozens over online posts after Erdogan rival detained
items.description: Some 37 people have been arrested for "provocative" social media posts, the interior ministry says.

items.title: What does the US education department do - and can Trump dismantle it?
items.description: The US president is expected to order a shutdown of the department, which he has already cut back.
